versions.raw_html:

green underline denotes added text
red struck out text denotes deleted text
2025 CT H 5047
Author: Lanoue
Version: Introduced
Version Date: 01/08/2025

STATE OF CONNECTICUT

General Assembly

Proposed Bill No. 5047

January Session, 2025

LCO No. 710

*00710*

Referred to Committee on LABOR AND PUBLIC EMPLOYEES

Introduced by:

REP. LANOUE, 45th Dist.

AN ACT CREATING A TASK FORCE TO STUDY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND THE STATE WORKFORCE.

Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives in General Assembly convened:

That the general statutes be amended to establish a task force to study the effect and fiscal impact of increasing the use of artificial intelligence by the state and the automation of the size and scope of the state workforce.

Statement of Purpose:

To study the practicality and use of increased artificial intelligence by the state and automation of the size and scope of the state workforce.

AN ACT CREATING A TASK FORCE TO STUDY ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND THE STATE
WORKFORCE.

Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives in General Assembly
convened:

That the general statutes be amended to establish a task force to study the
effect and fiscal impact of increasing the use of artificial intelligence by
the state and the automation of the size and scope of the state workforce.

**Statement of Purpose:**

To study the practicality and use of increased artificial intelligence by the
state and automation of the size and scope of the state workforce.
